description:
This feature considers the following behaviour

-Testing that the Shopping Cart tracks items correctly
name: Shopping cart

elements.name: "Users should be able to enter into homepage"

steps.name: it should display one search box

elements.name: "User can be able to search black dress product"
"User adds the first dress, continues shopping,adds the second dress and goes on Proceed to checkout"

steps.name: I add to cart the first dress
it should display one alert with "1" items
it should appear Search page "Search - My Store"
I add to cart the second dress
it should display one alert with "2" items
I click on Proceed to checkout
it should appear Order page "Order - My Store"

elements.name: "User change the quantity to 2 of the second dress"

steps.name: I am in shopping-cart summary section
I change of quantity of second dress to 2
the value in qty should be 2

elements.name: "User removes the first dress on summary section"

steps.name: I am in shopping-cart summary section

elements.name: "User goes back to Login page after click in Proceed to checkout"

steps.name: I am in shopping-cart summary section
it should appear authentication page "Login - My Store"

description:
This feature considers the following behaviour

-Testing the Sign-in feature
name: Sign-in

elements.name: "Users should be able to enter in Login page"

steps.name: I mark the Sign in section
it should appear authentication page "Login - My Store"
it should display the panel to registered and create account

elements.name: "Address is required to sign in"

steps.name: it should appear an error "An email address required"

elements.name: "It shows an alert when the address "1" is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid email address."

elements.name: "It shows an alert when the address "ae@" is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid email address."

elements.name: "It shows an alert when the address "ae@.com" is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid email address."

elements.name: "It shows an alert when the address "ae@gmail" is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid email address."

elements.name: "It shows an alert when the address "ae@." " is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid email address."

elements.name: ""It shows an alert when the address is correct but the password is required

steps.name: it should appear an error "Password is required."

elements.name: "It shows one alert when the password is invalid"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Invalid password."

elements.name: "It shows one alert of Authentication failed when address is not according with password"

steps.name: it should appear an error "Authentication failed."

elements.name: "Users have the possibility to link about Forgot the password"

steps.name: there is a link to forgot password
it should appear Forgot password page "Forgot your password - My Store"
there are textbox for email address and button Retrieve password

elements.name: "Validation of address to recovering password"

steps.name: I am in Forgot password section
it should appear an error "There is no account registered for this email address."

elements.name: "Validation of address valid to recover a password"

steps.name: I am in Forgot password section
it should appear an error "Invalid email address"

elements.name: "Recovering password successfully"

steps.name: I am in Forgot password section
it should appear an alert "A confirmation email has been sent to your address:"
it should appear authentication page "Login - My Store"

elements.name: "Users should be able to login successfully"

steps.name: it should appear my account page "My account - My Store"
